Uses of Package
org.robolectric.util

  • Packages that use org.robolectric.util 
    Package Description
    org.robolectric
    Package containing main Robolectric classes.
    org.robolectric.shadows
    Package containing shadow classes for the Android SDK.
    org.robolectric.shadows.support.v4
    Shadows for the Android Support Library.
    org.robolectric.util
    Package containing general utility classes.
  • Classes in org.robolectric.util used by org.robolectric 
    Class and Description
    ActivityController 
    FragmentController
    Controller class for driving fragment lifecycles, similar to ActivityController.
    ReflectionHelpers.ClassParameter
    Typed parameter used with reflective method calls.
    Scheduler
    Class that manages a queue of Runnables that are scheduled to run now (or at some time in the future).
    ServiceController
